Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, City of Bossier City
PW Police Jury -- 3 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Millage Renewal Proposition)
 
Summary: 10-year 3 mills property tax renewal for the purpose of maintaining and operating the correctional facilities in Bossier Parish including the furnishing of transportation and medical care for prisoners.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Bossier, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy and collect a three (3) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021 (an estimated $2,400,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of maintaining and operating the correctional facilities in the Parish including the furnishing of transportation and medical care for prisoners?
